name: Magic Warriors 2015: Fighting RPG
description:
The only one Fighting rpg card game!

Once upon a time....history was buried,in the circle of time..,
Things that keep the history rolling is the infinite power of change..,
Human have the wings to fly to their dreams,
In between the centuries, in order to restrict the excessive use of power the Academy is founded,
Knowledge turns into flames of war....,
Technology became weapons....,
Flames and technology has turned the and into the ground of blood..,
The darkness is recycling.,
Cycle of fate.. Is start to roll now.


The first RPG game + card elements is now available for download.
What's new:
1. download will rewards diamonds which worth $2,
2. player can earn diamonds and golds by complete main task.
3. daily login rewards
4. online rewards( diamonds, golds)
